thread.title: BRIEF-22Nw Fund Issued Statement Regarding Aimia's Upcoming Annual General Meeting Of Shareholders To Elect Aimia's Board

title: BRIEF-22Nw Fund Issued Statement Regarding Aimia's Upcoming Annual General Meeting Of Shareholders To Elect Aimia's Board
text:
April 13, 2018 / 12:26 PM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-22Nw Fund Issued Statement Regarding Aimia's Upcoming Annual General Meeting Of Shareholders To Elect Aimia's Board Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 13 (Reuters) - Aimia Inc: 
* ISSUED STATEMENT REGARDING AIMIA’S UPCOMING ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS TO ELECT AIMIA’S BOARD 
* INTENDS TO WITHHOLD VOTES FOR ALL LEGACY BOARD MEMBERS AT UPCOMING ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING * OWNS ABOUT 3 PERCENT OF AIMIA 
* SAYS “WE BELIEVE SHARES OF AIMIA ARE SIGNIFICANTLY UNDERVALUED” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
